D

DataCleaner - Class in sun.datafusion.index
This class clear index and unused DataStored automatically
DataCleaner(String) - Constructor for class sun.datafusion.index.DataCleaner
Creates a DataCleaner with the given directory and starts the processing thread.
DataFuser - Class in sun.datafusion.fuse
Performs the DataFusion operation.
DataFuser(Node, Directory, Manager) - Constructor for class sun.datafusion.fuse.DataFuser
Constructor that initializes the Fusion operation and starts the processing thread.
DataIndexer - Class in sun.datafusion.index
This class takes DataSources from the DataRetriever and uses Apache Lucene to index the data.
DataIndexer(DataStored, Directory, Manager) - Constructor for class sun.datafusion.index.DataIndexer
Creates a DataIndexer with the given retriever and starts the processing thread.
DataRetriever - Class in sun.datafusion.index
Periodically gets unindexed data sources a spawns a dataFuser to deal with each of them
DataRetriever(Properties, Directory, Manager) - Constructor for class sun.datafusion.index.DataRetriever
Constructor that initializes the parameters, details, and starts the buffer thread
